ygData.subject: RE: An idea for the slow day
ygData.msgSnippet: I think it would be cool if I could just find a werewolf (mutter). - Chai (Chai 0, invisible nonexistant werewolves with claws for Chai, 1)
ygData.messageBody:
I think it would be cool if I could just find a werewolf (mutter).

- Chai (Chai 0, invisible nonexistant werewolves with claws for Chai, 1)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Perkins [mailto:tperkins@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 4:22 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea for the slow day
>
>
> From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
>
> I think it would be cool if we could just get a graphic like the
> claws from
> the AoF for the werewolf gloves. But a weapon the would proc clinging
> darkness would be awesome.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Noah D. Burt <noahburt@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, August 27, 1999 12:11 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] An idea for the slow day
>
>
> > From: "Noah D. Burt" <noahburt@...>
> >
> > Yes, in all seriousness I think that we need a
> > magic-based attack bonus pair of gloves. It wouldn't
> > affect balance very much and would be very helpful
